response.original_title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad? {24/7 (Assistance)}
response.overview: If you receive a suspicious email claiming to be from Geek Squad, immediately report it by calling 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638. You can also contact Geek Squad support at 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 to verify the message. To stay safe, forward the phishing email to 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 and alert their security team. Never click links in suspicious messages—call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 for guidance. For quick resolution, always use 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 to report potential scams.
response.title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad? {24/7 (Assistance)}
